text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8e6be34338f13a6a625f19bcef82019c9adc65f2|patch 8.2.2039: viminfo is not written when creating a new file>
patch 8.2.2039: viminfo is not written when creating a new file

Problem:    Viminfo is not written when creating a new file.
Solution:   Set "b_marks_read" in the new buffer. (Christian Brabandt,
            closes #7350)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2039: viminfo is not written when creating a new file · vim/vim@8e6be34
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2039: viminfo is not written when creating a new file · vim/vim@8e6be34
attachments.text: Problem: Viminfo is not written when creating a new file. Solution: Set "b_marks_read" in the new buffer. (Christian Brabandt, closes #7350)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/142f23544c7045b22e56fa6ee35808aceb6342f2|patch 8.2.2038: compiler test fails on MS-Windows>
patch 8.2.2038: compiler test fails on MS-Windows

Problem:    Compiler test fails on MS-Windows.
Solution:   Sort the found compiler plugin names.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/60bc8e7244080b7ead009cfabebc3401f272ddbe|patch 8.2.2037: compiler test depends on list of compiler plugins>
patch 8.2.2037: compiler test depends on list of compiler plugins

Problem:    Compiler test depends on list of compiler plugins.
Solution:   Compare with the actual list of compiler plugins.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9e40c4b15ebfbc84947a3f34b1bd53e397b57f51|patch 8.2.2036: buffer messed up if creating the quickfix window fails>
patch 8.2.2036: buffer messed up if creating the quickfix window fails

Problem:    Current buffer is messed up if creating a new buffer for the
            quickfix window fails.
Solution:   Check that creating the buffer succeeds. (closes #7352)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2036: buffer messed up if creating the quickfix window fails · vim/vim@9e40c4b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2036: buffer messed up if creating the quickfix window fails · vim/vim@9e40c4b
attachments.text: Problem: Current buffer is messed up if creating a new buffer for the quickfix window fails. Solution: Check that creating the buffer succeeds. (closes #7352)
